name: Elite Military Girl - Updated March 2021
description:
Connect with me on LinkedIn:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/amir-mansaray-39907689/

I'm a BSc Computer Games Design and Placement Year graduate looking for full-time animation and game development work, graduating in April 2021.

*This game is playable in the Unreal Engine 4 editor.*

Each animation is showcase standalone within the project, with a playable character set-up using animation blueprint, and an animation montage with an animation cancel sate. Particles, sounds, and turn-tables within the level are also included, alongside a tutorial UI which can be hidden to better view the animations.  

GiG - Amir Mansaray - Elite Military Combo by AmirMDEV on Sketchfab

View the sketchfab model here: https://skfb.ly/6YuUS

Please note that as of January 2021, Nvidia driver 461.09 can crash Unreal Engine on startup. You have to reinstall the driver or roll back the driver.

Unreal Engine 4.26 is used and will be required to open the project.

For Grads in Games Animation Jam 2021 - Created by Amir Mansaray

Unreal Project, and PDF Documentation attached.

Military Girl Rig created by Perry Leijten:

https://www.perryleijten.com 

Portfolio Website:

https://www.amirmansaray.com
